Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseUserController
controller.StaffController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController
public class StaffController extends BaseUserController
Controller for staff-specific operations. Handles approval/rejection of company representatives, internships, and withdrawal requests. Provides access to all system internships with filtering capabilities.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

    • approveRejectCompanyRep

      public void approveRejectCompanyRep(String repID, boolean approve)
      Approves or rejects a company representative account.
      Parameters:
      repID - The ID of the company representative
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • updateInternshipApproval

      public void updateInternshipApproval(int internID, boolean approve)
      Approves or rejects an internship listing.
      Parameters:
      internID - The ID of the internship
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • approveRejectWithdrawal

      public void approveRejectWithdrawal(int appID, boolean approve)
      Approves or rejects student withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      appID - The ID of the application
      approve - true to approve withdrawal, false to reject

    • getPendingInternships

      public List<String> getPendingInternships()
      Gets all pending internships awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      List of formatted internship strings

    • getPendingCompanyReps

      public List<String> getPendingCompanyReps()
      Gets pending company representatives awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      List of formatted company representative strings with PENDING status

    • getWithdrawalRequests

      public List<String> getWithdrawalRequests()
      Gets all pending withdrawal requests.
      Returns:
      List of formatted application strings with WITHDRAWAL_REQUESTED status

    • listInternshipOpportunities

      public List<String> listInternshipOpportunities()
      Lists all internship opportunities with applied filters. Staff can view all internships in the system. Uses FilterSettings to filter by Status, Major, Level, Closing Date, etc.
      Returns:
      List of formatted internship strings

    • getInternshipDetails

      public String getInternshipDetails(int internshipID)
      Gets detailed information about a specific internship. Staff can view all fields including status and visibility.
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetails in interface UserController
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetails in class BaseUserController
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to view
      Returns:
      Formatted internship details

    • editProfile

      public void editProfile(String name, String email, String department)
      Edits staff profile fields (null values skipped, in-memory only).
      Parameters:
      name - New name (null to skip)
      email - New email (null to skip)
      department - New department (null to skip)
